title: Explaining cryptocurrency to a beginner
context: Tell a friend what Bitcoin is and how digital wallets work.

content.bestLine: Bitcoin is a digital currency stored in online wallets

neutral.text: Bitcoin is a type of cryptocurrency
You can use it to buy things online
Bitcoin is decentralized, meaning no government controls it
You need a digital wallet to store and use Bitcoin
Bitcoin transactions are recorded on a public ledger
It's a new way to think about money

informal.text: You can buy stuff online with it
It's like having cash in your pocket, but on your phone
You gotta have a digital wallet to use it
Bitcoin is kinda like a secret money
It's a new way to make payments
You can use it to buy video games or music
It's like the money in your bank, but digital

options: a new way to think about money
